thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 24 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Sichuan Jiuzhou Electronic sees FY 2017 net profit down 92.13 pct to 100 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Sichuan Jiuzhou Electronic sees FY 2017 net profit down 92.13 pct to 100 pct

organizations.name: reuters) - sichuan jiuzhou electronic co ltd

text:
Jan 24(Reuters) - Sichuan Jiuzhou Electronic Co Ltd :
* Sees FY 2017 net profit to decrease by 92.13 percent to 100 percent, or to be 0 to 15 million yuan
* Says FY 2016 net profit was 190.6 million yuan
* The reason for the forecast is sharply decreased profit in DTV industry and air traffic industry as well as internet of things industry
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/iqejtg Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
